mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge, memberEmail, memberPhone, memberProFileName) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberEmail},#{memberPhone},#{memberProFileName})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
select * from member_table order by id desc
mapper.update: update member_table set memberPhone=#{memberPhone} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select memberId from member_table where memberId=#{memberId}
